bullets: Hydraulic fittings have more leak path interfaces to check/seals to renew (6 against 2) and more mechanical threads to inspect (5 against 3).
Mechanical and hydraulic access fittings can both be rated to 10'000psi and above.
Mechanical tools are rated to 6000psi; hydraulic tools offered at 10,000psi.
title: Hydraulic vs. Mechanical Access Fitting Systems
